channel.title: Comments on: What are you listening to – April 08?

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Arthur, thanks for the BIPPP tip!

item.title: By: Arthur
item.dc:creator: Arthur
item.description:
This isn't new, but...
There's a French Synth Wave compilation that's been on heavy rotation at the local college station. My friend in Canada says it's getting airplay north of the border as well.
It's called BIPPP. You may have already heard it.
item.content:encoded:
This isn’t new, but…

There’s a French Synth Wave compilation that’s been on heavy rotation at the local college station. My friend in Canada says it’s getting airplay north of the border as well.

It’s called BIPPP. You may have already heard it.
